subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Indians placed outfielder Jason Michaels on the 15-day disabled list because of a sprained right ankle yesterday and purchased the contract of the left-hander Jeremy Sowers from Class AAA Buffalo and added him to their roster.
snippet: The Cleveland Indians placed outfielder Jason Michaels on the 15-day disabled list because of a sprained right ankle yesterday and purchased the contract of the left-hander Jeremy Sowers from Class AAA Buffalo and added him to their roster.
